attributes.action: Let Parliament alone decide whether we go to war
attributes.additional_details: Currently the decision to take this country to war is made by the ruling party's cabinet and the reigning monarch. I propose that we remove the monarch's outdated role, and that once a cabinet consensus for war has been reached it is put to parliament for a free majority vote either for or against. Only then will we risk our troops, not at the whim of political expediency.
